tool_description: This tool optimizes the variable region structures of the antibody based on the given antibody-antigen complex.

required_parameters.name: antigen_antibody_structure
required_parameters.description: The path to the antigen-antibody complex PDB file.

optional_parameters.name: diffab_config
optional_parameters.description: codesign_single: Sample both the sequence and structure of one CDR; codesign_multicdrs: Sample both the sequence and structure of all the CDRs simultaneously; abopt_singlecdr: Optimize the sequence and structure of one CDR; fixbb: Sample only the sequence of one CDR (fix-backbone sequence design); strpred: Sample only the structure of one CDR (structure prediction).

optional_parameters.name: num_samples
optional_parameters.description: Number of samples taken at each prediction.

return_values.name: complex_structure
return_values.description: The designed and docked 3D structure of the antibody-antigen complex saved as a PDB file.
